timeline.message: LP string kind to Dataflow to avoid double LP.

timeline.bodyText: If this is only meant to be used for custom coder tests, should it just be renamed instead? It seems unlikely to be used by user code right now.
timeline.author: youngoli

replies.bodyText: Note that most things that aren't in the main beam package are really intended for user use.  I'll send a separate PR moving/removing this code, I just didn't want this PR to become too messy.
replies.author: lostluck
